title: CUPSHE Women Ruffle Floral Maxi Summer Dress Off Shoulder Short Sleeve Backless Flounce Bodice Slit Hem Beach Dresses

Slit design and elastic waist help the dress fit better. Tripical tree paisley brings a strong vacation style and adds a cool atmosphere to the hot summer!

[Multi Occasional & Gifting]:This black tropical tree short sleeve off the shoulder midi beach summer dress is perfect for beach, casual, daily, school day, vacation, ceremony, welcome dress, girls dinner, cafe, high tea, working day etc. This mini dress is the best choice for your trip with your friends!

[Feature]: off the shoulder dress for women/short sleeve dress for women/pink tropical tree paisley dress/elastic waist dress summer/pull on dress/ruffled maxi dress/ slit summer dress for women/beach dress/a line dress for women/casual dress
[Fabric And Care]: The dress is made of 95% polyester and 5% spandex so that it is soft and comfortable. Regular Wash; Recommend with Cold Water; Do not Use Bleach; Do not Tumble Dry.
